website_summaries.verdict: A larger-capacity microwave that will feed the whole family while adding plenty of class to any kitchen.
pros: Inside LED light is bright, so you can easily keep an eye on the cooking process
Easy to use with plenty of preprogrammed choices
Food heats up quickly and evenly
Users love how the black stainless steel complements their other appliances
cons: The microwave is light for its size and sometimes slides across countertops, and its feet don't grip surfaces securely

customer_reviews.title: Five star all the way
customer_reviews.text: Have used it heavily, tried most of the features over the last week. Also had done lots of digging into Consumer Reports, other sources, this model gets good marks.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dark interior
customer_reviews.text: The interior was surprisingly dark, compared to other microwaves i have had that all had white interiors. The interior LED doesn't put out much light, so the dark interior is really emphasized.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made microwave oven with plenty of features at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this new Sharp Carousel microwave based on the 21 years of service I got from my old Sharp Carousel oven. I'm loving all the new features on the control panel. The only drawback is the learning curve, acclimating to all the new functions. Overall, this is a sturdy, well made oven.
customer_reviews.author: gemini68

customer_reviews.title: A Brand new Microwave.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a full power 1100 watt Microwave. And this Sharp SMC1452CH delivers. Everything works as described. This is the first Microwave I have ever purchased. All the other Microwaves I owned were "hand-me-downs!" I did my research, and read all the reviews. and this Sharp was the best!! I HIGHLY recommend this model, you will not be be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch
customer_reviews.text: My last microwave (an Emerson) died after 6 or 7 years so I did quite a bit of research on what to get next. Decided on this Sharp model. Medium/Large size with solid build construction. It's very quiet and has no problem heating food up nice and evenly. I like the blue LED display and the gray interior. It has a nice sturdy door handle as opposed to the push button types. This microwave has a unique sensor heat technology that can detect when your food is steaming. This makes it a snap to reheat food without trying to guess how long you should cook it for.
customer_reviews.author: DarkStoneCastle
